title: Odessa police investigating accidental shooting
content:
ODESSA, TX (KWES) -
Odessa police are investigating following an accidental shooting.
We're told the shooting happened in the 3700 block of Andrews Highway.
Authorities said one person was hit by a bullet and was taken to the hospital.
The victim is expected to be OK.
Police also said that they have also detained one person.
